description: Mangold AB is a holding company, which engages in the provision of financial services to companies, institutions, and individuals. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 61 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2012-07-12. The firm provides services within corporate finance, equities, market making, and issuing and asset management. Mangold AB is a liquidity providers and Certfied Advisers on First North and is under the supervision of the Swedish FSA. The firm is also a member of the Stockholm Stock Exchange, NASDAQ OMX Nordic, AktieTorget and Nordic Growth Market. The firm provides equity related structured products as well as issues of instruments with other underlying asset classes such as currencies, commodities, mutual funds and fixed income instruments.Additionally, Mangold’s equity sales offers individuals, businesses and institutions execution services for equities, equity related instruments and derivatives.
naics: Securities and Commodity Contracts Intermediation and Brokerage
naicsSubsector: Securities, Commodity Contracts, and Other Financial Investments and Related Activities
name: Mangold AB
